channel.title: Road to 99 fleching
channel.description:
I have decided to go ahead and nab a second 99. Going to take a while though lol. Currently at 4.85M xp, and just under 500k until level 90. I am craft maple longs as I do not have the money to dump on magic logs. Unless someone has some to throw away ;) Anyways I generally have a bad habbit of loosing interest but I really want a trimmed skillcape lol, so I am hoping that this thread will help me keep motivated.
I have 89 fleching (JUST obtained as I was typing), and around 69k maple logs left to cut, then to string them.
If anybody is interested in helping, just post a GL or something, even shoot me a message on MSN to help me keep motivated. Soharuda@hotmail.com

item.title: Road to 99 fleching
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:14, topic:423468”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=526108.msg3831708#msg3831708 date=1322622260]

But clicking in the exact same coordinates repeatedly is also very obvious.

A I think even I am smart enough for an randomised offset?

It’s still obviously spotted. >.>
[/quote]

On top of that, don’t forget your misclicks, afk’s, people talking, randoms, and offsets =][/quote]
AFK’s are simple, just pause the program at random moments in time for 30-80 seconds. Misclicks, well, I don’t even misclick but maybe once every couple hours, no need. People talking? I havent said a word in 2 weeks on there

Read full topic

item.title: Road to 99 fleching
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:9, topic:423468”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=526108.msg3831576#msg3831576 date=1322616406]

Hard trying to do this and program -.-

Maybe I should do some research into clicking on a pixel pattern with Java an such. Make some kind of Macro -.-

I would macro at all. My skiller got banned for auto talking for less than an hour. I think Jagex is trying very hard to keep macro’s away.
[/quote]
Yea but auto-talking is VERY easy to catch as its 100% visible. Fleching, all I do is click like 5 things, not much to censor.[/quote]

I was still banned, normally it’d be a week long mute at best. Jbex r crackin’ down on us leik dey not leik us.

Read full topic

item.description:

Hard trying to do this and program -.-

Maybe I should do some research into clicking on a pixel pattern with Java an such. Make some kind of Macro -.-
[/quote]Wrong topic?

Are you in the wrong topic?

Anyways, I’d come fletch with you if I wasn’t already 99, but good luck and stay motivated.
It’s alot easier if you have a spare lap top to watch a movie or two on while doing it. ;)[/quote]
I have my PSP playing movies right next to my latop.

@Tiny - No, not wrong topic, just a little off subject.
